name: Le Mixeur

power.comment: Look on the floor under the tables, or on the wall.

wifi.comment: Good wifi (sadly behind a proxy for authentication). Some exotic ports are blocked. Password is written on the walls.

comment: It's free for everyone! Tables, sofas, amazing architecture: very cool place. Often empty then quiet, sometimes occupied for meetings by local communities.

name: Central Parc Café

wifi.comment: Ask the password to the owner

coment: You're supposed to order regularly to be allowed to stay a long time. But the owner never asked for it.

name: Good Dog's Bar

wifi.comment: True good wifi. Password printed on order tickets.

coment: Excellent but cheap burgers and hot-dogs. Very nice place.
